how do yall do stuff like that what.

Next to "Reply" there's the "Quote" button.  That one let's you reply using a format that repeats what the person said.  I pressed "Quote" on Lincoln, copied that, cancelled my reply, then pressed "Quote" on Panda and pasted Lincoln's quote (still with the formatting that lets you quote) into the formatting that let me quote Panda.  Really tho it's mostly a process of guess and check.

This reminds me of a game that I was playing Fiddlesticks jungle, I didn't type on the chat and because I didn't gank Top lane Zed the moment I actually said something to the chat he typed: "Shut up shittlesticks" 
{{champion:9}} {{item:3070}}  Devastated
This made me laugh way more than it should have. Especially since it was toxicity, but that's still some funny shit.

I had a poke around that site (seeing how the mods don't care). Found some to add to my collection, so +1.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LyJzpOAs,comment-id=0007000200000001,timestamp=2017-04-29T19:06:46.533+0000)
>
> I had a poke around that site. Found some to add to my collection, so +1.

Glad you liked it.

Must be because you're not from EUNE. The NA mods HATES people form EUNE. 

I posted an inappropriate image of Ahri once. To my defense, I copy-pasted the NSFW version of the image i wanted by mistake - and didn't check the post afterwards to check for (grammatical) mistakes. 

I received my perma-Board ban within _**7 minutes**_ (time before I noticed the mistake and tried to edit - which was too late).

Luckily, I managed to argue my mistake to Support, and they let me off with a 7-day suspension.
2 days, RIP Mods.

As i told the guy; he's not from EUNE.

Maybe my mistake was posting an image directly, whereas a link is too much work for them to open. Or maybe they're all too busy fapping to the content, I dunno.

Another week ban I got was when _describing_ a NSFW image between Leona and Diana. 
No links at all; just a Google search phrase. That one happened within 2 hours after posting.

Considering it's now been 2 days for a worse offense, I get renewed hate towards the mods here for past injustice, so well done, them.
I highly doubt thats the actual reason why. It's most likely because the NA boards are much larger and no one pays attention to the non-front page posts unless its something _really_ crazy.
Well, it definitely was nothing _really_ crazy (nothing..."unnatural", anyway). Dunno about the front page-part though. Thinking back, I doubt it.
